msg: update EJB examples, add note to bind OJB main/access classes to JNDI

author: brianm
msg: Add a temporary (until final API is decided) way to expose the Unit from grafolia on a PB instance, add unit test demonstrating lazy graph insertion.

msg: Added support for specification of sql builder properties in the ant task

author: tomdz
msg: To preserve 1.0 behavior the OJB instance in the PBF is now created automatic upon request if none was set yet
The MetadataManager.getInstance now uses the OJB instance in the PBF instead of a separate singleton
